23
▪To evaluate a PTM with a test collection:
▪Create ground truth by creating a relevant list for 
each document.
▪Create a retrieved list by pairwise comparison 
with the PTM representation
▪Compare both list for all documents in the test-
collection to obtain MAP@10
EVALUATION
Ground truth
